title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Blended Learning Design for Teachers and Workforce Capacity Building

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational theory and professional work experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can resolve at least 80% of educational problems occurring in actual work situations using mixed-method approaches.
Learners can write a 5-page report explaining the linkage between teacher learning and workplace learning.
Learners can propose three practical educational improvement strategies through collaborative PBL projects with peers.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
